desc.en: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.jp: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和尼禄找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让尼禄受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和妮露找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让妮露受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。

desc.en: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.jp: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时茜突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时茜突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.jp: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令尼禄将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。时向尼禄开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令宁瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉音表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向宁瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令妮露将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。时向妮露开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

name.en: How About Falling Down The Sky
name.jp: How About Falling Down The Sky

desc.en: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.
desc.jp: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.
desc.zh_cn: 老师的意图此时终于表现出来：既然是为地面作战设计，在空中又怎么样呢？事实证明的确如此。虽然只有一瞬间的时间，但柚子已经完全注意到了其弱点所在。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.jp: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄最终还是没能胜利。莉央指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠最终还是没能胜利。莉音指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露最终还是没能胜利。莉央指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。
